success.title: Payment successful
success.description: Thank you for making the payment. Your support really helps. You can return to the fundraiser or go to the home page.

failure.title: Payment failed
failure.description: An unexpected error occurred while processing your payment. If the funds were debited, they will be refunded to the same account within 3 business days.

cancel.title: Payment canceled
cancel.description: The payment has been canceled. If you didn't cancel it, please contact usâ€”we'd be happy to help. We'll help.
